nodes.text: Travis Chaz was a male from Elrood who worked as The Pit's main bartender for more than 30 years. Chaz was burly and a no-nonsense man, although he was also friendly highly intelligent. Chaz knew about illegal landing fields, which customs officials were easily fooled, how to get black market goods, and which employers were the most honest. Chaz also knew a lot about the whereabouts of different personalities that haunted the Elrood sector.
